| HistoryText             = The Exiles are a group of international would-be world conquerors, who were allies of the [[Johann Shmidt (Earth-616)|Red Skull]] during [[World War II]]. After WWII, they were gathered by the mad scientist [[Carlo Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] on his island and rounded up by the military after his defeat.{{r|Tales of Suspense Vol 1 #41}} They have aided Red Skull on several occasions in the modern era and later resurfaced as agents of his daughter, [[Sinthea Shmidt (Earth-616)|Sin]]. They were all presumably killed in [[Sweden]] while fighting [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] and [[S.H.I.E.L.D.]]{{r|Avengers Vol 4 #16}}
